channel.title: My Hiscores.sql is to big for 000webhost phpmyadmin upload! how to upload?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i just finished a tut on hiscores, but the hiscores.sql is to big for the upload on phpmyadmin on 000webhost :S
how can i still upload it? because without it nothing will work.

item.title: My Hiscores.sql is to big for 000webhost phpmyadmin upload! how to upload?
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

000webhost is garbage, if you’re lookin for a good free webhost I suggestion www.x10hosting.com

Read full topic

item.title: My Hiscores.sql is to big for 000webhost phpmyadmin upload! how to upload?
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

HcoJustin:

How is it too big to upload? Surely its an empty database… You could always recreate it by hand through phpmyadmin if needed

The server has a max upload of 2kb

Read full topic
